attributes.description:
This is our favourite springtime bouquet. And as part of our promise to reduce the carbon emissions we produce, all of these tulips have been grown closer to home. 
 Carefully packed by hand, with delicate blooms individually netted, and delivered to the door in our bespoke packaging, with a gift card including your personal message. Choose free next day delivery via Royal Mail Tracked or upgrade to Premium Delivery for improved tracking and reliability. We’re working hard to get beautiful blooms out for all our customers. But we’re facing some unusual supply issues for some of our flowers at the moment. This means that we might need to send you a bouquet with a few different stems. If this happens, we’ll let you know and always send something similar.
attributes.email_description:
This is our favourite springtime bouquet. And as part of our promise to reduce the carbon emissions we produce, all of these tulips have been grown closer to home.

What's in the box?
28 tulips, of mixed colours. These tulips are grown in the UK, and we send with bulbs attached for added freshness. The best bit? The bulbs can be replanted and enjoyed next spring.
attributes.long_description:
This is our favourite springtime bouquet. And as part of our promise to reduce the carbon emissions we produce, all of these tulips have been grown closer to home.

  • 28 tulip stems, of mixed colours.

  • Delivered to the door, with a gift card including your personal message

  • Beautifully pre-arranged by hand, and delicate blooms are individually netted

  • Choose free next day delivery via Royal Mail Tracked or upgrade to Premium Delivery for improved tracking and reliability.

  • We’re working hard to get beautiful blooms out for all our customers. But we’re facing some unusual supply issues for some of our flowers at the moment. This means that we might need to send you a bouquet with a few different stems. If this happens, we’ll let you know and always send something similar.
attributes.name: The Seasonal Tulips

attributes.description:
With life being so fast-paced, it can be hard to find time to relax. So if you’re in need of some R&R (or know someone who is), this is just the treat. With scented stocks and soothing rosemary, you’ll feel at peace in no time. 
 Carefully packed by hand, with delicate blooms individually netted, and delivered to the door in our bespoke packaging, with a gift card including your personal message. Choose free next day delivery via Royal Mail Tracked or upgrade to Premium Delivery for improved tracking and reliability. We’re working hard to get beautiful blooms out for all our customers. But we’re facing some unusual supply issues for some of our flowers at the moment. This means that we might need to send you a bouquet with a few different stems. If this happens, we’ll let you know and always send something similar.

attributes.description:
Want to show someone how thankful you are for all they do? Pick our Safa. Her delicate campanula stems are a symbol of gratitude. And she smells just as lovely as she looks. Bonus!
Choose free next day delivery with Royal Mail or upgrade to Premium Delivery for improved tracking and reliability. Note, each stem is unique and seasonal, so on the rare occasion colours may vary or we'll substitute stems to give you the highest-quality bouquet.

attributes.description: Thank someone for all their positivity with a little Rae of sunshine. Because even our most cheerful friends need a pick-me-up every so often. And sunflowers make everyone smile. Carefully packed by hand, with delicate blooms individually netted, and delivered to the door in our bespoke packaging, with a gift card including your personal message. Choose free next day delivery via Royal Mail Tracked or upgrade to Premium Delivery for improved tracking and reliability. We’re working hard to get beautiful blooms out for all our customers. attributes.email_description:
Thank someone for all their positivity with a little Rae of sunshine. Because even our most cheerful friends need a pick-me-up every so often. And sunflowers make everyone smile.

What's in the box?

attributes.long_description: Want to support a friend who’s going through a hard time? This’ll give them a much-needed uplift. Bursting with colour, our Sunniva is like a hug in the post. And is sure to bring a smile back to their face.
attributes.name: The Rae
